The word of the LORD came again unto me, saying,
Son of man, set thy face against the Ammonites, and prophesy against them;

And say unto the Ammonites, Hear the word of the Lord GOD; Thus saith the Lord GOD; Because thou saidst, Aha, against my sanctuary, when it was profaned; and against the land of Israel, when it was desolate; and against the house of Judah, when they went into captivity;

Behold, therefore I will deliver thee to the men of the east for a possession, and they shall set their palaces in thee, and make their dwellings in thee: they shall eat thy fruit, and they shall drink thy milk.<RF>men: Heb. children<Rf>
And I will make Rabbah a stable for camels, and the Ammonites a couchingplace for flocks: and ye shall know that I <FI>am<Fi> the LORD.

For thus saith the Lord GOD; Because thou hast clapped <FI>thine<Fi> hands, and stamped with the feet, and rejoiced in heart with all thy despite against the land of Israel;<RF>hands: Heb. hand<Rf><RF>feet: Heb. foot<Rf><RF>heart: Heb. soul<Rf>

Behold, therefore I will stretch out mine hand upon thee, and will deliver thee for a spoil to the heathen; and I will cut thee off from the people, and I will cause thee to perish out of the countries: I will destroy thee; and thou shalt know that I <FI>am<Fi> the LORD.<RF>a spoil: or, meat<Rf><CM>
Thus saith the Lord GOD; Because that Moab and Seir do say, Behold, the house of Judah <FI>is<Fi> like unto all the heathen;

Therefore, behold, I will open the side of Moab from the cities, from his cities <FI>which are<Fi> on his frontiers, the glory of the country, Bethjeshimoth, Baalmeon, and Kiriathaim,<RF>side…: Heb. shoulder of Moab<Rf>
Unto the men of the east with the Ammonites, and will give them in possession, that the Ammonites may not be remembered among the nations.<RF>with…: or, against the children of Ammon<Rf>
And I will execute judgments upon Moab; and they shall know that I <FI>am<Fi> the LORD.

Thus saith the Lord GOD; Because that Edom hath dealt against the house of Judah by taking vengeance, and hath greatly offended, and revenged himself upon them;<RF>by…: Heb. by revenging revengement<Rf>

Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; I will also stretch out mine hand upon Edom, and will cut off man and beast from it; and I will make it desolate from Teman; and they of Dedan shall fall by the sword.<RF>they…: or, they shall fall by the sword unto Dedan<Rf>

And I will lay my vengeance upon Edom by the hand of my people Israel: and they shall do in Edom according to mine anger and according to my fury; and they shall know my vengeance, saith the Lord GOD.

Thus saith the Lord GOD; Because the Philistines have dealt by revenge, and have taken vengeance with a despiteful heart, to destroy <FI>it<Fi> for the old hatred;<RF>for the…: or, with perpetual hatred<Rf>

Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; Behold, I will stretch out mine hand upon the Philistines, and I will cut off the Cherethims, and destroy the remnant of the sea coast.<RF>sea coast: or, haven of the sea<Rf>

And I will execute great vengeance upon them with furious rebukes; and they shall know that I <FI>am<Fi> the LORD, when I shall lay my vengeance upon them.<RF>great vengeance: Heb. great vengeances<Rf><CM>
